name: HTML
description: HTML (HyperText Markup Language) is used to structure web pages.

name: CSS
description: CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is used to style web pages.

name: JavaScript
description: JavaScript is a programming language used to create interactive web pages.

name: Redux

name: Tailwind CSS
description: Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework that provides flexibility in styling.

name: Bootstrap
description: Bootstrap is a CSS framework for quickly building responsive web designs.

name: Node.js
description: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime environment used for backend development.

name: Firebase
description: Firebase is a backend-as-a-service platform that provides a database and hosting.
